attributes.action: Make the promotion of atheism a requirement of all educational establishments within the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Without compromise to freedom of thought, expression or human rights, the promotion of atheism and associated moral values must be made a priority teaching for our children.

Atheists do not contribute to war, sectarianism, or other crime committed as a consequence of religious programming.  Neither is an atheist’s time or money parted through a life-long battle for self-righteousness in life and moral high-ground in death.  

Atheists do not mutilate the genitals of their children and nor do they enslave them through arranged marriage.  Neither do they punish themselves through abstinence of nourishment, sexual satisfaction or any other illogical behavior.

Atheists work, help others, and contribute to society without the presence of dogmatic belief or mental constraint.

We believe the teaching of religious mythology to children too immature to reason for themselves to be nothing short of child abuse, and incompatible with the civilised, pioneering legacy that our international admirers respect us for.
